I am Professor of Information Management at the [Berlin School of Library and Information Science](http://hu.berlin/infomgnt) at [Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin](http://hu-berlin.de), and Scientific Consultant for Open Science at the [Helmholtz Association’s](https://www.helmholtz.de/) [Open Science Office](https://os.helmholtz.de/).

On this website, you will find information about my work and research.

## Blogging

While not always as frequently as I’d like, I blog about innovations in scholarly communication at <i class="bi bi-wordpress"></i> [wisspub.net](http://wisspub.net/).

At Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin, our [Research Group Information Management](http://hu.berlin/infomgnt) hosts a virtual research lab, where we regularly share updates on our projects and research: <i class="bi bi-rss"></i> [infomgnt.org](https://infomgnt.org)

## Contact

The best way to reach me is by email: [heinz.pampel\@hu-berlin.de](mailto:heinz.pampel@hu-berlin.de)

```{=html}
<script>
(function () {
  var root = document.getElementById('infomgnt-feed-items');
  var FEED_PRIMARY = 'https://infomgnt.org/index.xml';
  var FEED_FALLBACK_JSON = 'https://api.rss2json.com/v1/api.json?rss_url=' + encodeURIComponent(FEED_PRIMARY);

  function stripHtml(html) {
    var div = document.createElement('div');
    div.innerHTML = html || '';
    return (div.textContent || div.innerText || '').trim();
  }
  function asDate(d) { try { return new Date(d); } catch (e) { return new Date(); } }
  function fmtDate(d) { return d.toLocaleDateString('de-DE', { year: 'numeric', month: 'short', day: '2-digit' }); }

  function makeCard(item) {
    var col = document.createElement('div');
    col.className = 'col';

    var card = document.createElement('div');
    card.className = 'card h-100 shadow-sm';

    var body = document.createElement('div');
    body.className = 'card-body';

    var h = document.createElement('h4');
    h.className = 'card-title h6 mb-2';

    var a = document.createElement('a');
    a.href = item.link || '#';
    a.target = '_blank';
    a.rel = 'noopener';
    a.className = 'stretched-link text-decoration-none';
    a.appendChild(document.createTextNode(stripHtml(item.title || 'Ohne Titel')));

    h.appendChild(a);

    var time = document.createElement('div');
    time.className = 'small text-muted mb-2';
    if (item.date) {
      time.appendChild(document.createTextNode(fmtDate(asDate(item.date))));
    }

    var p = document.createElement('p');
    p.className = 'card-text mb-0';
    var desc = stripHtml(item.description || '').slice(0, 220);
    if (desc) p.appendChild(document.createTextNode(desc + '…'));

    body.appendChild(h);
    if (item.date) body.appendChild(time);
    if (desc) body.appendChild(p);

    card.appendChild(body);
    col.appendChild(card);
    return col;
  }

  function render(items) {
    if (!items || !items.length) {
      root.innerHTML = '';
      var col = document.createElement('div');
      col.className = 'col';
      col.innerHTML = '<div class="alert alert-warning mb-0">Keine Einträge gefunden.</div>';
      root.appendChild(col);
      return;
    }
    root.innerHTML = '';
    items.forEach(function (it) { root.appendChild(makeCard(it)); });
  }

  function fetchXML(url) {
    return fetch(url, { headers: { 'Accept': 'application/rss+xml, application/atom+xml, application/xml;q=0.9, text/xml;q=0.8' } })
      .then(function (res) { if (!res.ok) throw new Error('HTTP ' + res.status); return res.text(); })
      .then(function (txt) {
        var doc = new DOMParser().parseFromString(txt, 'application/xml');
        if (doc.querySelector('parsererror')) throw new Error('XML parse error');
        var nodes = Array.prototype.slice.call(doc.querySelectorAll('item, entry')).slice(0, 8);
        return nodes.map(function (n) {
          var isAtom = n.tagName.toLowerCase() === 'entry';
          var t = (n.querySelector('title') || {}).textContent || '';
          var linkEl = isAtom ? (n.querySelector('link[rel="alternate"]') || n.querySelector('link')) : n.querySelector('link');
          var l = isAtom ? (linkEl && linkEl.getAttribute('href') || '') : (linkEl && linkEl.textContent || '');
          var dNode = isAtom ? (n.querySelector('updated') || n.querySelector('published')) : n.querySelector('pubDate');
          var d = dNode && dNode.textContent || '';
          var descNode = n.querySelector('description, summary, content, content\\:encoded');
          var desc = descNode && descNode.textContent || '';
          return { title: t, link: l, date: d, description: desc };
        });
      });
  }

  function fetchJSON(url) {
    return fetch(url)
      .then(function (res) { if (!res.ok) throw new Error('HTTP ' + res.status); return res.json(); })
      .then(function (data) {
        return (data.items || []).slice(0, 8).map(function (i) {
          return { title: i.title, link: i.link, date: i.pubDate || i.updated, description: i.description || i.content || i.summary };
        });
      });
  }

  // 1) Direkt den XML-Feed laden; 2) bei CORS/Fehler auf JSON-Fallback ausweichen.
  fetchXML(FEED_PRIMARY).then(render).catch(function (e1) {
    fetchJSON(FEED_FALLBACK_JSON).then(render).catch(function (e2) {
      console.error('Feed-Fehler', e1, e2);
      root.innerHTML = '<div class="col"><div class="alert alert-danger mb-0">Der Feed konnte nicht geladen werden. <a class="alert-link" href="https://infomgnt.org" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Direkt zu infomgnt.org</a></div></div>';
    });
  });
})();
</script>
```
